This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Ensures that the document base color is exposed. 
PASS Ensures that the color of the parent is exposed if the text background is transparent. 
PASS Ensures that the color of the parent is the only one exposed if it is not transparent. 
PASS Ensures that semi-transparent text background color is blended with document base color. 
PASS Ensures that background colors of overlapping objects are blended. 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
